name: Her Choice
storyline:
Just as you are getting acquainted with your new life in Wingate, you receive an unexpected invitation: spend one week (all-expenses-paid) on the set of your favourite drama, tour the shooting locations and meet the actors, have we mentioned it’s all-expenses-paid? It’s a once in a lifetime chance to experience the world of celebrities, and, who knows, take your fanfiction to the next level!

But the set is nothing like you imagined it to be, and the romantic and alluring façade that bewitched millions of fans might be just that, a façade.

The dark, tangled world that lies behind those shiny gates will bring back a secret to haunt you from the past you have tried very hard to leave behind …

Who are you? Why were you invited to the set?

There is only one person who knows the truth …
summary: A thrilling and plot rich otome romance visual novel
